meta.name: description
meta.content: Thorndale ISD's goal is to prepare every student for lifetime success through strong academic and extra-curricular programs supported by partnerships with parents and the community. Thorndale ISD will develop students who reflect a spirit of excellence in the pursuit of college, career readiness and effective citizenship.

div.p: MAKE IT Different. The all new 2020 Thorndale yearbook is now on sale - you won't want to miss this! You may purchase online or contact Mrs. Bouldin

div.h4: Random Drug Testing Policy Posted Date: 04/21/2020
div.p: Please read and review the newest Random Drug Testing Policy for TISD - https://bit.ly/2RWzE3O . . .

div.h4: TISD Boys Athletic Director Update Posted Date: 04/24/2020
div.p: Thorndale ISD is sad to say goodbye to our boys athletic director, Coach Scott Hawkins.Coach John Kovar will be taking over the reigns as boys Athletic Director and Head Football. . . .

div.h4: Thorndale ISD will be closed through May 22nd Posted Date: 03/31/2020
div.p: Thorndale ISD will be closed through May 22nd. To view all updates for TISD pertaining to the COVID -19 virus and school closures please visit https://www.thorndale.txed.net/39754_1 . . .

div.h4: Thorndale COVID 19 Comprehensive Plan Posted Date: 04/03/2020
div.p: Please see latest updates in the blue to the Comprehensive Plan. ​ Please visit https://bit.ly/39GtWsE for more. . . .

div.h4: Stay Home When Sick Continued - COVID 19 Posted Date: 04/17/2020
div.p: #COVID19 lives in the lungs of people with the virus, even if they don’t have symptoms. If you can’t stay home, wear a mask, stay 6 feet apart, and wash hands. . . .

div.h4: Stay Home When Sick Continued - COVID 19 Posted Date: 04/16/2020
div.p: #COVID19 lives on droplets in the lungs of people with the virus, even if they don’t have symptoms. When infected people breathe, the virus enters the air. #DontGoViral . . .

div.h4: Stay Home When Sick - COVID 19 Posted Date: 04/15/2020
div.p: Before social distancing, each person with #COVID19 spread the virus to 2.5 more people. At that pace, most would get it, and many more people would die. But we can slow the spread. . . .

div.h4: Don't Spread Germs - COVID - 19 Posted Date: 04/14/2020
div.p: You can spread #COVID19 without knowing you have it. Whether you have symptoms or not, #StayHome. https://tea.texas.gov/staywell . . .

div.h4: Keep Hands Clean & Disinfect - COVID-19 Posted Date: 04/10/2020
div.p: Did you know that washing your hands with soap & water eliminates #Coronavirus molecules preventing the virus from infecting you & others? Science says it works. https://bit.ly/2w7TGAJ . . .

div.h4: Practice Social Distancing - COVID 19 Posted Date: 04/09/2020
div.p: To avoid the spread of COVID-19 in our community. Get more information at https://texas.gov/covid19 . . .

div.p: It is the policy of Thorndale ISD not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, handicap, or age in its employment practices as required by Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972; the Age Discrimination Act of 1975, as amended; and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended.

It is the policy of Thorndale ISD not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, handicap, or age in its employment practices as required by Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972; the Age Discrimination Act of 1975, as amended; and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended.
